tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to a denial of service condition where parsing a specially crafted, malformed PDF file can trigger an endless loop in `RawDataParser.php`, leading to uncontrolled memory allocation, memory exhaustion, and a fatal crash of the PHP process.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `smalot/pdfparser` library to the patch version.
